about_the_game:
This is the free version of Outbreak Survivors, an Action Roguelite packed with challenges and a sole objective: survival.

Fight against hordes of zombies that will come from all directions, using your battle experience to learn powerful skills that will help you defeat all enemies in this apocalypse.

Active Skills

Use a variety of skills to help you against the creatures from the apocalypse

Multiple Weapons

Each character has it own unique weapon that has a different playstyle

Features In Prologue

  • Twelve powerful skills that can be upgraded during the match.
  • Two characters with unique weapons, that can be evolved to better weapons during the match
  • A Ability Tree to evolve your character and get further in the apocalypse
  • Dozens of power ups to fortify your character
  • Your progress will be carried to the full game

Features in Full Game:

  • New characters with unique weapon and skills
  • A weapon crafting/customization system
  • A Vehicle system with each character having it's own vehicle with unique abilities
  • A Mechanic to customize and reinforce your vehicles with weapons and armors
  • A Deeper Ability Tree, with each character having it's own tree
  • A Item system that add unique power ups
  • New Unique Maps
  • A Mission System that appears randomly during the match
  • Stronger and different types of Zombies
  • Longer match duration
  • Achievements

About Us

We are Little Nap Studio, a studio brazilian created by 3 friends who love to play games, and has decided to make their own games.
Your review is very important for us, thank you very much for your attention

name: Outbreak Survivors Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I5 7400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: In the apocalypse, survive against the zombies until the rescue come for you. In this Action Roguelite game, you will unlock new weapons, characters and unique skills to help in your survival.
